metadata.title: CVE-2024-22862 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg before n6.1, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via the JJPEG XL Parser.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
